definition: in a quick and lively tempo, (of tempo) fast, a musical composition or musical passage to be performed quickly in a brisk lively manner
details:
adverb
- in a quick and lively tempo
= example: in a quick and lively tempo
adjective
- (of tempo) fast
noun
- a musical composition or musical passage to be performed quickly in a brisk lively manner
- a brisk and lively tempo
